name: Mr'Ghorth
description:
Our entry for this spookytober jam.

I'll try to polish until the deadline, but I'm not sure If it will be possible. 

user key  'x' to use the cult master powers, 'z' to sumon Kha'Renm, the merchant and 'tab' to visualize how many days your cultists will survive before you reap all their sanity.

There are lot's of bugs and the game is not balanced yet.  Try to find both finals

All musics and sfx are under cc0 license. All sprites were done by KeichTS and myself. The font used is cc0 too. I'll update later with all the files used.
Thank you!
